preqs: Students must have passed one of the following: ETG1102, ETW1102, ETS1102 or ETW1000 before undertaking this unit.

rules.ruleString: Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {ETB1100, ETG1102, ETP1100, ETS1102, ETW1000, ETW1102} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Unit was previously coded {ECM2111, ECN2111, ETS2111, ETW2111, ETX2111}
Must be enrolled in course type {10, 20, 41, 50}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {ETB2111, ETW1010, ETW2010, ETW2111, ETX2111}

time: Summer semester B (starts January) 2017 (On-campus block of classes)

description: This unit aims to provide an understanding of sampling designs and inference, confidence limits and tests on means, proportion, differences, cross tabulation, with chi square, simple and multiple linear regression (regression with non-linear terms), regression with dummy variables, and an introduction to the analysis of variance. This unit uses Excel.
